Rose Bowl Champions |BowlTourney=[[1957 Rose Bowl|Rose Bowl]] |BowlTourneyResult=W 35-19 vs. [[1956 Oregon State Beavers football team|Oregon State]] }} {{1956 Big Ten football standings}} The '''1956 Iowa Hawkeyes football team''' represented the [[University of Iowa]] in the [[1956 college football season]]. The Hawkeyes were champions of the [[Big Ten Conference]] and beat the [[1956 Oregon State Beavers football team|Oregon State Beavers]] in the [[1957 Rose Bowl|Rose Bowl]], a rematch of a regular season game. ==Season== ===Schedule=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:black;color:yellow;" | '''Game''' || '''Date''' || '''Opponent''' || '''Result''' ||
